name: Orbeetle
author: yuu
flavor_text: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

abilities.name: Jamming Attachment
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may attach up to 3 Energy cards from your opponent’s discard pile to your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Mysterious Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
